aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-8310-678 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Reservoir fluid level sensor failure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 28/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 29/10/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 31/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 03/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 07/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
